body:
When you go to the home page, the buildings look like there was a texture pack involved.  It looks cool and i want to check it out.  Also if you guys know of other popular texture packs please list them below.  I don't know if there was a post about this already, so please no hate comments.  Thank you

-Tarheelkiwi

title: Official Avicus Texture Pack

replies.body: I use faithful cusised by me to 128x128
replies.body_tagged: I use faithful cusised by me to 128x128

replies.body: i think its just the shaders mod or something
replies.body_tagged: i think its just the shaders mod or something

replies.body:
They probably used something like Athery's or another medieval-ish texture pack. But, the lobby still looks great in default, faithful, and most PvP texture packs.

I use a custom PvP Faithful-Edit, found on my YouTube channel.
